projects.title: Social media manager
projects.description:
I build social media systems that don’t just look good—they work: strategy, calendars, campaigns, and measurable growth.

Every brand I work with gets a tailored playbook rooted in insight, storytelling, and platform psychology.

From content planning to execution, I turn chaos into a clear, scalable structure that teams can actually use.

My portfolio reflects real results: improved engagement, stronger brand recall, and content that converts.

This is not just social media management—it’s brand-building through consistency, creativity, and data-backed decisions.

projects.title: Marketing & Content Strategist
projects.description:
I design content systems that align brand goals with audience behavior—scalable, data-led, and ROI-driven.

With five years in strategy, I turn insights into predictable content outcomes that drive growth, not noise.

I build long-term content frameworks that streamline workflows, strengthen storytelling, and improve efficiency.

My experience helps brands move from inconsistent posting to intentional, measurable content ecosystems.

I translate business objectives into content roadmaps that deliver clarity, consistency, and performance.
Built strategic posting calendars and repurposed long-form content for LinkedIn optimization.

projects.title: Ed-tech industry
projects.description: Generated articles achieving 1.56K+ views through SEO optimization and social distribution.

projects.title: COPYWRITER
projects.description:
• Myntra’s Big Billion Days buzz with a sharp, trend-led social strategy built for scale and speed.
• Engineered platform-specific content that boosted click-throughs.
• Designed real-time engagement workflows to capitalize on peak traffic and micro-moments during the sale.
• Delivered a cohesive campaign that blended performance, storytelling, and brand excitement.
